item.title: A World War II Dispute Between Ukraine and Poland Is Put to Rest
item.description: The remains of people killed and left in mass graves in the waning days of the war are being given dignified burials.

item.title: At Least 425 Pro-Palestinian Protesters Arrested in London on Terrorism Charges
item.description: The demonstrators oppose the British government’s decision to designate Palestine Action as a terrorist organization.
